sentence.text: These effects are thought to have a significant negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II upon both vascular and cerebrovascular health, ultimately with the potential to prevent cardiovascular and potentially neurodegenerative disease with a vascular component, for example vascular dementia.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: However, there is adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway variation in the literature due to the heterogeneous nature of the randomised controlled trials conducted.

entity.text: adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
